DOC.brief_summary: Angeliq regulatory Post-Marketing Surveillance ( PMS ) get data safety efficacy real practice indication approve Korea Food Drug Administration ( KFDA ) . This non-interventional , prospective , multi-center study.Target number patient 4500 .
